text: If you want to repeat something a random amount of times, you should create a variable before specifying it in the "Loop Count" field of a Loop Controller, because Sometimes the loop will be skipped completely.
creator: vzaidman@gmail.com
p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Hello,
Can you clarify your problem ?
Is it a problem or not ? 

A simple test plan showing the issue is welcome.
Regards
